body_html:
So, any progress? i have similar errors when compiling tensorflow v1.4.0.

bazel-out/host/bin/_solib_k8/_U_S_Sthird_Uparty_Smkl_Cintel_Ubinary_Ublob___Uexternal_Smkl_Slib/libmklml_intel.so: error: undefined reference to 'dlopen'
bazel-out/host/bin/_solib_k8/_U_S_Sthird_Uparty_Smkl_Cintel_Ubinary_Ublob___Uexternal_Smkl_Slib/libmklml_intel.so: error: undefined reference to 'dlerror'
bazel-out/host/bin/_solib_k8/_U_S_Sthird_Uparty_Smkl_Cintel_Ubinary_Ublob___Uexternal_Smkl_Slib/libmklml_intel.so: error: undefined reference to 'dlsym'
bazel-out/host/bin/_solib_k8/_U_S_Sthird_Uparty_Smkl_Cintel_Ubinary_Ublob___Uexternal_Smkl_Slib/libmklml_intel.so: error: undefined reference to 'dladdr'
collect2: error: ld returned 1 exit status

ldd bazel-out/host/bin/_solib_k8/_U_S_Sthird_Uparty_Smkl_Cintel_Ubinary_Ublob___Uexternal_Smkl_Slib/libmklml_intel.so
	linux-vdso.so.1 =>  (0x00007ffca8917000)
	libiomp5.so => not found
	libpthread.so.0 => /lib64/libpthread.so.0 (0x00007fc4f8c30000)
	libm.so.6 => /lib64/libm.so.6 (0x00007fc4f892e000)
	libc.so.6 => /lib64/libc.so.6 (0x00007fc4f856b000)
	/lib64/ld-linux-x86-64.so.2 (0x000055607a1eb000)

body:
So, any progress? i have similar errors when compiling tensorflow v1.4.0.

```/opt/rh/devtoolset-6/root/usr/bin/gcc -o bazel-out/host/bin/tensorflow/python/gen_lookup_ops_py_wrappers_cc '-Wl,-rpath,$ORIGIN/../../_solib_k8/_U_S_Stensorflow_Spython_Cgen_Ulookup_Uops_Upy_Uwrappers_Ucc___Utensorflow' '-Wl,-rpath,$ORIGIN/../../_solib_k8/_U_S_Sthird_Uparty_Smkl_Cintel_Ubinary_Ublob___Uexternal_Smkl_Slib' -Lbazel-out/host/bin/_solib_k8/_U_S_Stensorflow_Spython_Cgen_Ulookup_Uops_Upy_Uwrappers_Ucc___Utensorflow -Lbazel-out/host/bin/_solib_k8/_U_S_Sthird_Uparty_Smkl_Cintel_Ubinary_Ublob___Uexternal_Smkl_Slib '-Wl,-rpath,$ORIGIN/,-rpath,$ORIGIN/..' -pthread '-fuse-ld=gold' -Wl,-no-as-needed -Wl,-z,relro,-z,now -B/opt/rh/devtoolset-6/root/usr/bin -B/usr/bin -pass-exit-codes -Wl,--gc-sections -Wl,-S -Wl,@bazel-out/host/bin/tensorflow/python/gen_lookup_ops_py_wrappers_cc-2.params)
bazel-out/host/bin/_solib_k8/_U_S_Sthird_Uparty_Smkl_Cintel_Ubinary_Ublob___Uexternal_Smkl_Slib/libmklml_intel.so: error: undefined reference to 'dlopen'
bazel-out/host/bin/_solib_k8/_U_S_Sthird_Uparty_Smkl_Cintel_Ubinary_Ublob___Uexternal_Smkl_Slib/libmklml_intel.so: error: undefined reference to 'dlerror'
bazel-out/host/bin/_solib_k8/_U_S_Sthird_Uparty_Smkl_Cintel_Ubinary_Ublob___Uexternal_Smkl_Slib/libmklml_intel.so: error: undefined reference to 'dlsym'
bazel-out/host/bin/_solib_k8/_U_S_Sthird_Uparty_Smkl_Cintel_Ubinary_Ublob___Uexternal_Smkl_Slib/libmklml_intel.so: error: undefined reference to 'dladdr'
collect2: error: ld returned 1 exit status
```

```
ldd bazel-out/host/bin/_solib_k8/_U_S_Sthird_Uparty_Smkl_Cintel_Ubinary_Ublob___Uexternal_Smkl_Slib/libmklml_intel.so
	linux-vdso.so.1 =>  (0x00007ffca8917000)
	libiomp5.so => not found
	libpthread.so.0 => /lib64/libpthread.so.0 (0x00007fc4f8c30000)
	libm.so.6 => /lib64/libm.so.6 (0x00007fc4f892e000)
	libc.so.6 => /lib64/libc.so.6 (0x00007fc4f856b000)
	/lib64/ld-linux-x86-64.so.2 (0x000055607a1eb000)
```
